node.title: Eight injured in two-car collision near Christchurch
node.content: ["Eight people were injured in a single road crash in Canterbury on Saturday night.\n", "Three were hospitalised with moderate injuries after two vehicles collided near Christchurch.", "Five others were treated at the scene by ambulance staff.", "The crash happened near the intersection of Robinsons and Ellesmere Rds, just after 8pm.", "Meanwhile, the holiday road toll stands at four fatalities.", "A person died after being struck by a vehicle in Auckland on Saturday night.", "The driver of a car died at the scene of a crash on the State Highway 1/Taieri Plains Highway, Waihola, in Otago on Saturday.", "Another person died following a crash involving a motorcycle at the intersection of Broadley Downs and Gordonton Rd, Gordonton, in Waikato, also on Christmas Day.", "The motorcyclist died at the scene.", "On Christmas Eve, one person died in a two-car crash south of Taup\u014d.", "RNZ"]
